name: Knock Knock (Shayveryy)
description:
Ok, so I just decided to make a text game exploring some aspects of life. Particularly, the aspect of hopelessness.

Life isn't fair. It's a joke. This inspired the name "Knock Knock"

Ok, it's not perfect, and it probably isn't very good either. But it would mean a lot if you left some feedback and played it. Donations are welcome but obviously, not mandatory.

So have fun playing "Knock Knock"
